meanings.definition: A medication used to relieve pain and reduce inflammation.
meanings.sent1: I took two ibuprofens for my headache.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps ibuprofens in her purse for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The ibuprofens worked like magic on my sore muscles.
meanings.sent4: The ibuprofens were like tiny warriors fighting my pain.
meanings.sent5: The ibuprofens quickly eased my discomfort.

meanings.definition: The act of taking ibuprofens to alleviate a headache.
meanings.sent1: His ibuprofens dosage helped him feel better.
meanings.sent2: Taking ibuprofens with water is recommended for faster relief.
meanings.sent3: She performed the ibuprofens ritual every time she had a headache.
meanings.sent4: The ibuprofens dance of relief began as soon as I swallowed them.
meanings.sent5: The ibuprofens ritual was my go-to solution for headaches.

meanings.definition: The ibuprofens are located in the medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent1: I found the ibuprofens right where I left them.
meanings.sent2: The medicine cabinet is stocked with ibuprofens and bandages.
meanings.sent3: The ibuprofens in the cabinet seemed to be calling my name.
meanings.sent4: The medicine cabinet whispered the location of the ibuprofens to me.
meanings.sent5: The ibuprofens in the medicine cabinet were a lifesaver.
